TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool Predicate<in T>(T obj);
.class public auto ansi sealed Predicate`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Predicate(Of In T)(obj As T) As Boolean
generic <typename T> public delegate bool Predicate(T obj);

span.span: The type of the object to compare.

param.name: obj
param.span: 要比較的物件，根據這個委派表示方法中所定義的準則。

span.span: The object to compare against the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate.

summary.span: 代表定義一組準則的方法，並判斷指定的物件是否符合這些準則。

span.span: Represents the method that defines a set of criteria and determines whether the specified object meets those criteria.

returns.span: 如果 符合這個委派表示方法中所定義的準則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if meets the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會使用幾種方法所和來搜尋項目集合中的類別。This delegate is used by several methods of the and classes to search for elements in the collection. 一般而言，委派由 lambda 運算式。Typically, the delegate is represented by a lambda expression. 由於本機範圍的變數可供 lambda 運算式，因此很容易測試精確地不是編譯時期已知的條件。Because locally scoped variables are available to the lambda expression, it is easy to test for a condition that is not precisely known at compile time. 這項模擬是在下列的範例中，定義`HockeyTeam`包含國家 Hockey 聯盟團隊和年成立的相關資訊的類別。This is simulated in the following example, which defines a `HockeyTeam` class that contains information about a National Hockey League team and the year in which it was founded. 此範例會定義代表年份的整數值的陣列，並隨機指派一個陣列項目`foundedBeforeYear`，這是一個變數，在本機範圍的範例`Main`方法。The example defines an array of integer values that represent years, and randomly assigns one element of the array to `foundedBeforeYear`, which is a variable that is locally scoped to the example's `Main` method. 因為本機範圍的變數可用於 lambda 運算式，lambda 運算式傳遞至方法可傳回`HockeyTeam`成立當天或之前該年度的每個小組的物件。Because locally scoped variables are available to a lambda expression, the lambda expression passed to the method is able to return a `HockeyTeam` object for each team founded on or before that year. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicate1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用具有委派方法來搜尋的陣列結構。The following code example uses a delegate with the method to search an array of structures. 此範例會明確地定義名為委派`predicate`並將它指派一個名為方法`FindPoints`會傳回`true`如果的乘積和欄位大於 100,000。The example explicitly defines a delegate named `predicate` and assigns it a method named `FindPoints` that returns `true` if the product of the and fields is greater than 100,000. 請注意，它是慣用使用 lambda 運算式而不是明確定義之型別的委派，如第二個範例所示。Note that it is customary to use a lambda expression rather than to explicitly define a delegate of type , as the second example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex2.vb#4)] 下列範例等同於上述範例中，不同之處在於它使用 lambda 運算式來代表委派。The following example is identical to the previous example, except that it uses a lambda expression to represent the delegate. 每個項目的`points`陣列會傳遞至 lambda 運算式，直到運算式找到符合搜尋準則的項目。Each element of the `points` array is passed to the lambda expression until the expression finds an element that meets the search criteria. 在此案例中，lambda 運算式傳回`true`產品 X 和 Y 欄位是否大於 100,000。In this case, the lambda expression returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex1.vb#2)]
